name: Fertilidad7
description:
Team:

Tei Brito - Design

Yosef García - Design

Carlos Alberto Morales - Programming

Néstor Alonso - Programming

bensound.com - Music

Controls:
    -Menu:

                    - "A" - "D" or Arrow keys -> Move between planets

                    - "Enter" -> Enter planet

   -Game:

                    - " WASD" or Arroy keys -> Move

                    - Left Mouse -> Shoot

     -"ESC" -> Close game.

Objetive:

Destroy all of the robots and machines in every level. You can get powerups (Speed and Inmortality) and medit kit for health.

Recomended resolución: 1920x1080
